          <title>
            <string language="sl">Trikraljevsko koledovanje - otroška folklora</string>
            <string language="en">Carol-singing - children folklore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Singen-Singen - Kinder Folklore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chanter-chant - enfants folklore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carol-cantar - crianças folklore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Carol-canto - bambini folclore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάλαντο-τραγούδι - λαογραφία παιδιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el Carol-cantar - niños folklore</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Postavitev je primerna za otroške folklorne skupine , predstavlja ljudski običaj trikraljevskega koledovanja</string>
            <string language="en">Play suitable for children folklore groups - old habit carol-singing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">folklora</string>
            <string language="en">folklore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">koledovanje</string>
            <string language="en">carol-singing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">navada</string>
            <string language="en">habit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel verwendbar für Kindfolkloregruppen - altes
Gewohnheit singen-Singen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu approprié aux groupes de folklore d'enfants 
- vieux chanter-chant d'habitude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo apropriado para grupos do folklore das 
crianças - carol-cantar velho do hábito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco adatto a gruppi di folclore dei bambini - 
vecchio carol-canto di abitudine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι κατάλληλο για τις ομάδες λαογραφίας παιδιών 
- παλαιό κάλαντο-τραγούδι συνήθειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juego conveniente para los grupos del folklore de
los niños - el viejo carol-cantar del hábito.</string>
          </description>
